normalised: Gas Cylinder Prices Give Diwali Shock!

Diwali just got a little less bright, folks. The price of domestic L P G cylinders saw another hike this week, pinching the pockets of common man. Sources say the rupee fifty increase is due to rising global crude oil prices.

unnormalised: Diwali just got a little less bright, folks. The price of domestic LPG cylinders saw another hike this week, pinching the pockets of common man. Sources say the Rs. 50 increase is due to rising global crude oil prices.
normalised: “Ab kya karein?” sighed Lakshmi Bai from Chandni Chowk, adding that it’s getting harder to manage the household budget. Doctor Sharma, an economist at J N U, stated that the government needs to re-evaluate its subsidy policies to ease the burden.

unnormalised: “Ab kya karein?” sighed Lakshmi Bai from Chandni Chowk, adding that it’s getting harder to manage the household budget. Dr. Sharma, an economist at JNU, stated that the government needs to re-evaluate its subsidy policies to ease the burden.
normalised: Remember that time when a cylinder cost just rupee four hundred? *Woh zamana bhi kya zamana tha!* Now, we're looking at close to rupee one thousand one hundred in some cities!

unnormalised: Remember that time when a cylinder cost just Rs. 400? *Woh zamana bhi kya zamana tha!* Now, we're looking at close to Rs. 1100 in some cities!
normalised: Industry experts predict further price fluctuations. This is impacting small businesses too, especially the numerous tea stalls dotted across Mumbai, each measuring a mere one hundred square feet. Looks like we all need to start saving those *chillar* and planning our gas usage more carefully. Stay tuned for more updates!

Looks like we all need to start saving those *chillar* and planning our gas usage more carefully. Stay tuned for more updates!
